meta.name: Generate 9:16 Images from Content and Brand Guidelines

name: Content to 9:16 Aspect Image Generator v1

parameters.content:
# AlexK1919 
![Alex Kim](https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D5603AQFOYMkqCPl6Sw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_400_400/profile-displayphoto-shrink_400_400/0/1718309808352?e=1736985600&v=beta&t=pQKm7lQfUU1ytuC2Gq1PRxNY-XmROFWbo-BjzUPxWOs)

#### I’m Alex, an AI-Native Workflow Automation Architect Building Solutions to Optimize your Personal and Professional Life.

### Example AirTable Base
https://airtable.com/appRDq3E42JNtruIP/shrnc9EzlxpCq7Vxe

### Link to my n8n Workflow Templates
https://n8n.io/creators/alexk1919

### Workflow Overview Video
https://www.youtube.com/@alexk1919_

### Products Used
[AirTable](https://airtable.com)
[OpenAI](https://openai.com/)
[Leonardo.ai](https://app.leonardo.ai/?via=alexk1919)

### About Me
https://beacons.ai/alexk1919

values.content:
=Prepare a script with 4 scenes for a short form video based on the following blog post:

Title:
{{ $json.Title }}

Content:
{{ $json.Content }}

The video should be less than 30 seconds in length.

Also create image prompts for each scene within the script.

Then output a image prompt for the video thmbnail.

The video will use a 9:16 aspect.

Output format:
Make sure you number each script and image prompt.

Scene 1 - 4
- script #
- image prompt #

Thumbnail Prompt

assignments.name: additional
assignments.value: Use the rule of thirds, leading lines, & balance.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "alchemy": true,
  "width": 768,
  "height": 1376,
  "modelId": "{{ $('Prompt Settings').item.json.model }}",
  "num_images": 1,
  "presetStyle": "DYNAMIC",
  "prompt": "{{ $json.body.promptGeneration.prompt }};",
  "guidance_scale": 7,
  "highResolution": true,
  "promptMagic": false,
  "promptMagicStrength": 0.5,
  "promptMagicVersion": "v3",
  "public": false,
  "ultra": false,
  "photoReal": false,
  "negative_prompt": ""
}

parameters.content: ### Uses the latest Leonardo.ai Model: Phoenix 1.0

assignments.name: additional
assignments.value: Use the rule of thirds, leading lines, & balance.

  "photoReal": false,
  "negative_prompt": ""
}

### Optionally, you can modify the number of images generated to provide more options
### Optionally, you can modify the number of images generated to provide more options

json.Name: Voice
json.Description: Assertive, friendly, and educational – "We sound like a trusted expert who’s here to help. We’re confident but approachable, breaking down complex ideas in a simple, actionable way."

json.Name: Audience
json.Description:
Primary Audience:

Mid-sized to enterprise businesses ($3M+ revenue)
Tech-savvy operations teams, AI enthusiasts, and digital creators
Secondary Audience:

Workflow managers and automation specialists
Tech entrepreneurs and SaaS decision-makers
Pain Points Addressed:

Manual, repetitive tasks
Inefficient workflows slowing growth
Difficulty leveraging AI and automation tools

json.Name: Brand Don'ts
json.Description:
Overcomplicate messaging with jargon-heavy language.
Stretch, distort, or recolor the logo.
Use off-brand imagery (e.g., cluttered visuals, low-quality images).
Create content without a clear takeaway or action.
Be too formal or robotic – keep it human and approachable.

json.Name: Tone
json.Description:
Professional for enterprise communications (e.g., LinkedIn posts, newsletters).
Conversational and energetic for social media (e.g., YouTube, TikTok).
Informative and engaging for tutorials and blogs.

json.Name: Vision
json.Description: To build a future where AI-driven automation seamlessly integrates into every business, unlocking creativity, efficiency, and growth for all.

json.Name: Mission
json.Description: To empower businesses and creators with smart, scalable automation and generative AI solutions that simplify workflows, save time, and drive innovation.

json.Name: Brand Do's
json.Description:
Use the logo and brand colors consistently.
Speak clearly and simply about complex AI workflows.
Balance creativity with professionalism in visuals.
Focus on solving real problems with examples and storytelling.
Use clean, modern designs in all content.

json.Name: Brand Story
json.Description: AlexK1919 was born from a love of AI, automation, and creativity. I saw businesses struggling with manual workflows and inefficiency, so I set out to build tools and share knowledge that simplify work and spark innovation. From branding to AI-native automations, the goal is simple: Empower businesses to work smarter, not harder.

json.Name: Core Values
json.Description:
Exploration – "We explore the edge of technology to uncover solutions that redefine possibilities."
Efficiency – "Every workflow, every solution – designed to optimize time, resources, and results."
Innovation – "We embrace new ideas, take risks, and push the boundaries of automation and AI."
Honesty – "Transparency is key; we say what we do and do what we say."
Impact – "We focus on meaningful results that create value for businesses and their teams."

generations_by_pk.prompt: Emerging from the computer screen, futuristic product designs intertwine with AI elements in a mesmerizing image of innovation. This digital creation depicts sleek, high-tech concepts in a dynamic and vibrant color palette. The visual is a highly detailed digital rendering that showcases cutting-edge technology and modern design aesthetics with impeccable precision. Each element exudes a sense of sophistication and creativity, capturing the essence of the boundary-pushing world of tech design.;

promptGeneration.prompt: Emerging from the computer screen, futuristic product designs intertwine with AI elements in a mesmerizing image of innovation. This digital creation depicts sleek, high-tech concepts in a dynamic and vibrant color palette. The visual is a highly detailed digital rendering that showcases cutting-edge technology and modern design aesthetics with impeccable precision. Each element exudes a sense of sophistication and creativity, capturing the essence of the boundary-pushing world of tech design.
